name: GGJ22 Jumping Philosophers
description:
Global Game Jam 2022 entry. https://globalgamejam.org/2022/games/jumping-philosophers-2

Find out that competition in the pursue of wisdom is also a cooperation.

One aspiring student philosopher needs another to get to the truth. However, only one will be rememberd byt the history!

-------------------------------------------------

Explore the knowledge with your friend-enemy (two players gameplay)! Every philosopher on the map will try to tell you his truths of life.

Get to them! Start the conversation, then try to get the knowledge (a letter) you need for the truth (displayed at the bottom of the screen).

Player who learns the most secrets - wins.

-------------------------------------------------

===-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------===

CONTROLS

Player 1

--

W --- Jump

A,D --- Left & right movement

S --- Talk/Choose letter

--

Player 2

--

Up arrow --- Jump

Left & right arrows --- Left & right movement

Down arrow --- Talk/Choose letter
